modShortDescription: Two cuckoo clocks, one digital clock, one wall clock - includes recipes and can be picked up. The wall clock has little red light bulb.
modDescription:
Two cuckoo clocks, one digital clock, one wall clock – includes recipes and can be picked up. The wall clock has that little red light bulb that lights up from 10pm to 4am.

One item modifier; goes into a helmet slot. Would work good for a mod where you don’t have a clock on the UI.

SphereII did the c# code for the blocks, Adreden did the c# code for the item modifier, Guppycur did the unity side stuff.

Want to use it in your mod? Credit the three of them.

This is a DMT mod. So requires [DMT Modding Tool](https://community.7daystodie.com/topic/13037-dmt-modding-tool/). To install: Copy this mod to the Mods folder in DMT. Then Build.

Guppycur has zero interest in tech supporting “how to install a dmt mod”.

**[Download](https://gitlab.com/guppycur/guppymods/-/archive/master/guppymods-master.zip?path=GuppycurWorkingClock)**

The forum topic of the mod is [here](https://community.7daystodie.com/topic/9144-guppycurs-modlets/).

**Credits:** [Guppycur](https://7daystodiemods.com/tag/guppycur/), SphereII, Adreden
